description:
http://anidb.net/ch76461 [Homura Ren] returns to his hometown of Kaminohara after a few years away, yet he possesses no memory of having lived there other than vague flashbacks. When he retrieves his smartphone which he sent to a shop for repairs, he discovers that a mysterious game titled Monster Strike has been installed on it. Then, he suddenly gets attacked by a strange bespectacled man who summons a monster from the game into the real world. Ren`s only chance of getting out of this situation alive is by summoning the dragon http://anidb.net/ch76460 [Oragon], who tells Ren that he will crush the opposing monster for him. Unfortunately, Oragon turns out to be a tiny dragon that seems completely useless! However, soon Ren finds a way to use Oragon in a battle. As he fights, his memory starts returning to him.
— written by Singan

REGULAR.description:
Ren returns to the town of his childhood, Kaminohara. 
Strangely, Ren is unable to recall any memories of the town. 
Meanwhile, his smartphone installs a mysterious game called Monster Strike — heralding the start of a desperate battle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: これが始めのストライク!

REGULAR.description:
Ren is forced into a heated battle with the bestial Fenrir X. 
Unable to control his companion Oragon and on the verge of defeat, a girl appears before Ren. 
Who could she be?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 指でヒッパレ! オラゴン!

REGULAR.description:
Almost every junior high student in Kaminohara plays Monster Strike. 
After a brief meeting, Aoi invites Ren to a special place—one where MS players gather.
Source: crunchyroll

Ren decides to challenge the Colosseum after being inspired by the epic battles between monsters. 
But Aoi`s a stickler and wants to do things right before joning the fray.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Colisée Monster Strike de minuit
真夜中のモンストコロシアム

REGULAR.description:
Ren and Aoi are attacked by a mysterious team of junior high schoolers. 
Backed into a corner, the two fight back...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ショッピングモールの決闘!

REGULAR.description:
Akira appears, bringing renewed hope to the desperate pair. 
Unfortunately, he refuses to fight as a team. 
Can the trio win the battle?
Source: crunchyroll

Aoi carries out Operation Recruit Akira—leading to a no-holds-barred blitz aimed at persuading Akira to rejoin the team. 
Is success around the corner?
Source: crunchyroll

Ren and the others set out to convince Minami to rejoin the team. 
They find a cursing Minami in the midst of a ferocious battle. 
Can Aoi manage to recruit Minami?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jagan demo Wakaba Minami Da zo!
邪眼でも若葉皆実だぞ!

REGULAR.description:
Minami has decided to destroy Aoi outside of Monster Strike. 
As announced, Minami uploads a shocking video of Aoi. 
Can they stop the out-of-control Minami?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 葵の恥ずかしすぎる動画!

REGULAR.description:
The team challenges Minami in a bid to remove the embarassing video. 
While being pushed back by Minami`s aggression, something becomes clear...
Source: crunchyroll

After the victorious battle, Ren and Aoi welcome the no-longer-possessed Minami into the team. 
To form a team of four, Aoi once again asks Akira but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 皆実, 仲間入ったってよ

REGULAR.description:
Is there a connection between Oragon and the possessed?! 
The team harbors doubts about Oragon while investigating his secret..
Source: crunchyroll

There may be a connection between MS Coliseum and the strange happenings in Kaminohara. 
To investigate, the team sneaks into the coliseum. 
There an ominous shadow appears...
Source: crunchyroll

Akira’s fine play should have turned the tables, but the dark aura surrounding Izanami Zero pushes the team to despair. 
It’s a do-or-die situation!
Source: crunchyroll

The deathmatch against Izanami Zero has ended, but a new threat appears. 
Who is K (King), and what is he aiming for? And a warrior god appears?! 
The curtains rise, unveiling a new season of Monster Strike the Animation!
Source: crunchyroll

Kamui goes berserk, and Fox Metal falls out of the ring. 
Doom`s strength devastates the entire party. 
All appears lost, until Ren begins to figure out the rules.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Counter! A Strike Shot for the Ages!
Riposte ! Un des strike shot du siècle !
反攻のストライクショット

REGULAR.description:
Ren and his team manage to escape from Doom`s grasp. 
Monster Strike and all the strange happenings associated with it leaves the gang with more questions than answers. K`s prophetic words linger—"The answers lie in your past."
Source: crunchyroll

The team searches for Haruma in Shibuya. A gigantic monster gate appears. 
As Ren and friends prepare for a throwdown, a mysterious attack destroys the monsters.
Could it be, Haruma?
Source: crunchyroll

The team is locked in a desperate battle against Underworld Rebel Lucy. 
Blasted by a fiery energy circle, they fire off their Strike Shots, only to be denied by an impervious barrier. 
How will the dice fall?
Source: crunchyroll

Haruma`s words stab at the hearts of Ren and his friends.
After their crushing defeat at Haruma`s hands, the team lies broken.
Amid the gloom, the strike ring glows
—a faint flicker of hope that brings the promise of a new meeting.

titles.title: 光るストライクリング

REGULAR.description:
Haruma`s on a different level.
To meet him again, Minami announces the creation of Club MS
—all in the name of reaching the top in Kaminohara.
However, the student council`s president may have a few complaints...

titles.title: Come One and All: MS Club
きたれ! モンスト部

REGULAR.description:
Ryoma`s on the ropes, unable to display his true power.
Ren`s time to shine has come to an abrupt end, but behind him the calvalry arrives.
Aoi and Napoleon attack head-on and begin to turn the tables.
Will it be enough to snatch victory from defeat?

- From the heavens... -
Ren`s vowed to bring out Ryoma`s potential, but is once again pushed back by an enemy stronger than Sakura—Dark Usurper Zeus.
With even Kamui and Napoleon struggling, Ren remembers words Akira has spoken in the past.
And then...?

- Here`s a bow, tied right on your heart. -
After a furious succession of battles, the gang finds themselves resting at Minamikaze.
But there, an out-of-control Akane storms onto the scene?!
To stop her, a battle begins, but there the first notes of a concert unfold.

- It`s always a party! -
The age of idols ends with Ren and the rest intact.
They`ve managed to avoid Snow Bow, but instead of disappearing, the field becomes consumed by fire.
From the depths of the inferno, a mysterious presence appears!

titles.title: 炎の闘神ニルヴァーナ

REGULAR.description:
- It`s always a party! -
The team is barely staying afloat against Nirvana.
Their attacks are ineffective and laughed away by the drunken Battle God.
It`s taking everything they have to stay one step ahead.
In a stroke of luck, a ray of light is assessed in the shape of a hole in a strange place.

- Finally, his golden age?! -
Ren is invited by both Aoi and Minami to go out shopping for their victory celebration.
In a stroke of stupidity, Ren manages to double book both of the girls.
How will he manage to escape from his perilous situation?

- Don`t even think about touching Haruma! -
The team returns to Shibuya with Taiyo and his team.
There they reunite with Haruma.
However, Haruma refuses to speak and dissapears, leaving behind a new enemy in his wake.

- I`ll cut you into cute, tiny, bite-sized pieces. -
Alice`s gatling gun and deadly trump minions push back Minami`s Dead Rabbits.
The Rabbits manage to strike back.
But instead of weakening, Alice becomes crazed and rips off a maniacal strike shot!

titles.title: アリス・イン・マッドランド

REGULAR.description:
- Divine words hold great power! -
An insane battle featuring Himiko`s golem and Napoleon`s rabbit army ensues.
A flurry of lasers and explosions rock the battlefield.
The scene then shifts to Akira and Taiyo battling against Kaoru.
A demonic shadow materializes before Kamui and Loki...

- Return to ash... -
Kamui is overpowered by Romeo`s onslaught.
Napoleon takes the full brunt of Himiko`s strike shot.
Even with the odds against them, Akira and Aoi continue fighting.
They gather their strength for one final push, all for the sake of meeting Haruma again.

titles.title: Kami no Yaiba to Akuma no Juukou

REGULAR.description:
- One thousand?! -
Lucy appears once more, jacking the entire city.
A sinister smile signals the coming of a swarm of Bahamuts. As crows change to dragons, the skies of Shibuya are covered in darkness.

- I`ll protect my friends and Haruma! -
The gang battles desperately, fighting for their very own survival. Yet the enemy is simply too powerful.
One by one, they reach the limits of their strength. In the end, only Ren is left standing.
Ren`s determination to protect his friends and Haruma resonate, awakening a new bond with Ryoma...

titles.title: 不滅のドラゴンスピリット

REGULAR.description:
- I`ve trained—and now I`m here to see you again. -
Ryoma sweeps the flock of a thousand Bahamuts in one fell swoop.
In front of him appears Lucy and Haruma. Another deathmatch begins...

- He`s the one who killed me, your mother... -
The indomitable dragon and fallen angel clash, lighting up the city.
Both refuse to give an inch. Haruma struggles, torn between memory and reality.
A mysterious shimmer appears...

- I will not let you have Haruma... -
Memento Mori, the Spirit of War, shows herself to be the cause behind Haruma`s pain.
Ryoma holds the elemental advantage, fire against wood.
As Ryoma moves in to finish the battle in one blow, a fog obstructs his path...

- Come to your senses, Haruma Kagutsuchi! -
Shino, Mariko, and Kaoru rise against Memento Mori to rescue Haruma.
Romeo, Alice, and Himiko`s bump combos push back Memento Mori.
However, in the field appears a black coffin...

- We were friends... -
It becomes apparent that the one who sent Memento Mori was none other than K,
who reveals himself to be Genma, Haruma`s father.
Why did the Warrior Gods appear?
What is their connection to the happenings in Kaminohara?
Genma reveals his ambitions...

- I wanted to apologize for that time... -
After discovering K`s ambitions,
Ren and the rest of the gang return to Kaminohara.
Telling Haruma that he wants to check on something,
Akira heads to the hospital where Haruma`s mother lies in a coma.

- You need help? I`m there! -
K is attempting to open another monster gate.
To prevent K`s plans from succeeding,
the gang heads to a physics research facility.
Taiyo and Shino join up in search of clues.

The gang arrives for XFLAG PARK. They have a blast at the venue, but they forget their original goal.
Source: crunchyroll

- Ren Homura... I`ve found you. -
In Kaminohara, Haruma sets out to find clues of
Shino`s whereabouts after her sudden disappearance.
Ren and friends join in the search,
but they come upon a giant snake who strikes without warning.

titles.title: 八雲立つ 逢魔の夜

REGULAR.description:
- Dance until you break! -
Kushinada`s warps and cross laser put the gang on the defensive.
Napoleon is defeated, while Ryoma and Alice are hanging on by a thread.
But not all is lost, as Minami discovers a nifty trick...

- We`ve been here in the past. -
Kushinada has been defeated and Shino rescued—but at what cost? Monster Strike has spilled into the real world, leaving damage in its wake.
Before the dust has settled, a message from Haruma arrives. He has found the physics research facility...

- A despair deeper than death... -
Babel has escaped the now destroyed physics research center.
Now, it terrorizes the residents of Kaminohara.
What did Babel mean by "a despair deeper than death"?

titles.title: 封印の破壊神 バベル

REGULAR.description:
- These memories... they`re ours! -
To reclaim Haruma`s memories, the gang stands up to Babel.
But Babel has only one target: Ren.
Ignoring Ryoma and the rest of the monsters` attacks,
Babel continues to aim for Ren.
In the midst of the chaos, an "Angel" descends...

- Feel the pain that I have felt! -
Ren and friends level their resolve against Babel.
Into the fray enters Himiko, Alice, and Romeo!
The situation shifts and Oragon now finds himself the target of Babel`s wrath...

- Do you believe in destiny? -
A petrifying attack hits Oragon as he makes a stand.
Oragon, on his last dregs of strength, begins to glow. A light flashes,
parting to reveal the depths of Oragon`s memories...

titles.title: オルタナティブドラゴンの記憶

REGULAR.description:
- The memories of humans are so beautiful... -
Karma, the Light of War appears.
Ren and friends battle to reclaim their memories,
but there`s something about Karma`s arms...

- Harken the light! -
Attacking Karma is a double-edged sword—the party gets increasingly weak due to Karma`s debuffs.
Akira realizes a path to victory and dashes forward with Kamui,
only to be cut down by Karma. Left with no options,
Akira is handed a smartphone by Genma. He prepares to strike...

titles.title: Kami no Hikari, Kami no Honoo

REGULAR.description:
- We`ll defeat you and reclaim everything! -
Ren is thrown into despair as he is confronted with the amnesiac Aoi, Minami, and Akira.
However, a familiar voice emerges from his smartphone.
With smartphone in hand, Ren calls on the last remnants of his strength
and goes toe to toe against Karma!

titles.title: Owari to Hajimari no Strike Shot
Strike Shot! An End and New Beginnings
終わりと始まりのストライクショット

SPECIAL.description:
Minami`s father, a former mercenary, is invited to an American naval party.
Ren and the gang end up heading to Okinawa with him for summer break.
On a sandy beach, Ren meets a mysterious girl.
"Help me..."
The girl leaves Ren with those words as she disappears.
Ren is drawn to the girl and the meaning of those words. He makes it his mission to save her, and uncover the truth.
Who is the girl? Why did she ask Ren for help?
The girl`s true identity slowly unveils...

titles.title: マーメイド・ラプソディ

SPECIAL.description:
- They deserve better. Someone better than me... -
The stage is set one year before Ren arrives in Kaminohara.
Akira has moved to Kaminohara from Sendai, all for the sake of revenge.
The wounds that his sister suffered in an MS battle fuel his vengeance.
A lost Haruma is given directions by Akira,
revealing a caring side to the usually cold and calculating teen.
Haruma observes Akira`s violent MS battles,
and realizes that Akira fights while reading his enemies` attacks.
Haruma proposes the idea of recruiting Akira to his teammates,
Aoi and Minami. Surprised and naturally reluctant,
Aoi and Minami decide to trust Haruma.
For Haruma has resisted recruiting the fourth member of their team,
saving the spot for the right person...

titles.title: Eiga Koukai Special: Rain of Memories
映画公開スペシャル: レイン・オブ・メモリーズ

WIKIPEDIA_JP: モンスターストライク_(アニメ)

titles.title: モンスターストライク
